attributes.action: Adopt Jeffrey Sachs economic proposals as outlined in the Reith Lecture 2/5/07 to eradicate poverty in the developing world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The end of poverty - by the year 2025 is within reach. It is a scientifically sound objective. And it is the most urgent challenge of our generation. With investment modern technologies and a change of approach by the countries in the West we can solve this problem
